mapper.select: SELECT SAL0300M_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS uploadId FROM DUAL

SELECT sm.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID ,sm.LOTY_UPLOAD_STATUS_CODE ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM sys0013m WHERE sm.LOTY_UPLOAD_STATUS_CODE =CODE AND CODE_MASTER_ID ='486') AS LOTY_UPLOAD_STATUS_NAME ,sm.LOTY_APPROVAL_STATUS_CODE ,sm.LOTY_APPROVER ,sm.LOTY_APPROVER_DATE ,sm.CRT_DT ,sm.CRT_USER_ID ,csy.USER_NAME AS updateor ,TO_CHAR(LOTY_APPROVER_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss') as lotyupdate ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAL0301D SS WHERE SS.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID= SM.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID AND NVL(SS.LOTY_VAILD_STATUS_CODE,0) =0 ) AS IN_VAL_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAL0301D SS WHERE SS.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID= SM.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID AND NVL(SS.LOTY_VAILD_STATUS_CODE,0) =1 ) AS VAL_CNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAL0301D SS WHERE SS.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID= SM.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID ) AS tot_Cnt FROM SAL0300M sm , sys0047m csy WHERE 1=1 AND sm.UPD_USER_ID =csy.USER_ID (+)
AND sm.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId }

SELECT sd.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID , sd.LOTY_MEMBER_CODE ,NVL(od.NAME,'') AS NAME ,sd.LOTY_MEMBER_STATUS_CODE ,sy.CODE_NAME ,sd.LOTY_START_DATE ,sd.LOTY_END_DATE ,sd.LOTY_PERIOD ,sd.LOTY_YEAR ,DECODE (sd.LOTY_VAILD_STATUS_CODE ,'0','InVaild' ,'Vaild') AS status FROM SAL0301D sd, ORG0001D od , SYS0013M sy WHERE sd.LOTY_UPLOAD_ID = #{uploadId } AND sd.LOTY_MEMBER_CODE =od.MEM_CODE (+) AND sd.LOTY_MEMBER_STATUS_CODE =sy.CODE (+) AND sy.CODE_MASTER_ID ='487'
AND nvl(sd.LOTY_VAILD_STATUS_CODE,0) = #{lotyMemberStatus }

SELECT LOTY_YEAR ,LOTY_PERIOD ,LOTY_MEMBER_STATUS_CODE ,CSY.CODE_NAME FROM SAL0301D , SYS0013M csy WHERE LOTY_MEMBER_CODE =#{memberCode} AND CODE_MASTER_ID ='487' AND LOTY_MEMBER_STATUS_CODE= CSY.CODE

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.MEM_ID, A.MEM_CODE,A.NAME, TO_CHAR(A.JOIN_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') JOIN_DT, V.DEPT_CODE, V.GRP_CODE, V.ORG_CODE, NVL(X6.M6,0) M6, NVL(X5.M5,0) M5, NVL(X4.M4,0) M4, NVL(X3.M3,0) M3, NVL(X2.M2,0) M2, NVL(X1.M1,0) M1, NVL(X0.M0,0) M0, NVL(M6,0)+NVL(M5,0)+NVL(M4,0)+NVL(M3,0)+NVL(M2,0)+NVL(M1,0) AS TOT_SAL, NVL(WS.WS_ACHV,'NO ACHIEVE') WS_ACHV, MP.MEET_POINT_CODE FROM ORG0001D A JOIN ORG1001V V ON V.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0003D AP ON AP.APLCTN_ID = A.APLICNT_ID LEFT JOIN REP0109T WS ON WS.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID AND WS.RPT_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1)))) AND RPT_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1)))) LEFT JOIN SYS0089M MP ON MP.MEET_POINT_ID = AP.APLICNT_MEETPOINT LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(1) AS M6 FROM SAL0001D WHERE PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-6)))) AND PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-6)))) GROUP BY MEM_ID)X6 ON X6.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(1) AS M5 FROM SAL0001D WHERE PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-5)))) AND PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-5)))) GROUP BY MEM_ID)X5 ON X5.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(1) AS M4 FROM SAL0001D WHERE PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-4)))) AND PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-4)))) GROUP BY MEM_ID)X4 ON X4.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(1) AS M3 FROM SAL0001D WHERE PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-3)))) AND PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-3)))) GROUP BY MEM_ID)X3 ON X3.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(1) AS M2 FROM SAL0001D WHERE PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-2)))) AND PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-2)))) GROUP BY MEM_ID)X2 ON X2.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(1) AS M1 FROM SAL0001D WHERE PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1)))) AND PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ( (ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1)))) GROUP BY MEM_ID)X1 ON X1.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MEM_ID, COUNT(1) AS M0 FROM SAL0001D WHERE PV_MONTH = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND PV_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY MEM_ID)X0 ON X0.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID WHERE A.MEM_TYPE = 1 AND A.STUS = 1
AND UPPER(A.MEM_CODE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{hpCode})||'%'
AND UPPER(V.ORG_CODE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{orgCode})||'%'
AND UPPER(V.GRP_CODE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{grpCode})||'%'
AND UPPER(V.DEPT_CODE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{deptCode})||'%'
AND MP.MEET_POINT_ID = #{meetingPoint}
) T WHERE T.TOT_SAL >= 1
